table_description: Information about blueprint descriptions, including ID, name, status, and synchronization details.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the blueprint.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current status of the blueprint (e.g., active, inactive).

columns.name: autoSync
columns.description: Indicates whether auto-sync is enabled for the blueprint.

columns.name: repo
columns.description: The repository associated with the blueprint.

columns.name: branch
columns.description: The branch in the repository for the blueprint.

columns.name: lastSync
columns.description: The timestamp of the last sync for the blueprint.
